sentences.en: Authorize the others is a half the battle, an all matters whether important or trivial, can't authorize work the other people's person, destine will meet tremendous obstacle.
sentences.cn: 授权他人是成功的一半，一个事无巨细，不能将工作授权别人的人，注定会遇到极大的障碍。

sentences.en: Induct electric power cable , shell up the destine length.
sentences.cn: 引入电力电缆, 在预定长度剥开.

sentences.en: Over these three years, miss her, read her person, what is he an eldest brother?But his love, destine and leave sorry!
sentences.cn: 这三年以来，想她，念她的人，何止他大哥一个？可是他的爱，注定是要留下遗憾的！

sentences.en: Some people destine to wait for other people.
sentences.cn: 有些人是注定等待别人的。

sentences.en: The cigarette love with match, destine to be hurt.
sentences.cn: 香烟爱上火柴, 就注定被伤害.

words.tran_cn: 注定（destine的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to set apart or appoint (for a certain purpose or person, or to do something); intend; design
